titles.title: Semiconductor Sovereignty Act
Semiconductor Sovereignty Act
To direct the Secretary of Commerce to submit reports on strategies regarding the manufacturing of, and research relating to, semiconductors and other similar technologies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
